diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $BC$ is $y$ units.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
